channel.title: Hi, I'm Michal
channel.description: Recent content on Hi, I'm Michal

item.title: AB Experiments strategy
item.description: Today I’ve discussed with Danny the approaches. Summary below. Iterative design It uses grand design as a direction we’d like the project to go. However, the changes are introduced iteratively. Each change introduced is atomic. You get a clear picture whether it is improving KPIs or not. If not, you tweak it until you get a positive result. Then test next atomic feature on top of it. The feature choice is complying with the grand design direction.

item.description: Hello world This is my first post.
